subject: Soccer
Sentences (Criminal)
Tax Evasion
lead_paragraph: Uli Hoeness, a revered figure in German soccer, said that he would resign as team president and that he would not appeal his sentence of three and a half years in prison.
snippet: Uli Hoeness, a revered figure in German soccer, said that he would resign as team president and that he would not appeal his sentence of three and a half years in prison.
